entry.title: DEEP Generic Container
entry.summary: This is a test using the DEEP Generic Container as an example.
entry.content: This is a test using the DEEP Generic Container as an example.

entry.title: DEEP Plant Classification Theano
entry.summary: A trained Convolutional Neural network optimized for plant identification using images. The architecture used is a Resnet50 [5] using Lasagne on top of Theano.
entry.content: A trained Convolutional Neural network optimized for plant identification using images. The architecture used is a Resnet50 [5] using Lasagne on top of Theano.
